name: Stubies
description:
＊ Apple Editors' Choice in more than a 100 countries
＊ Starbucks Pick of the Week
＊ #1 GAME in more than 20 countries

"...too fun to pass up on playing." 148Apps
"...A fresh-feeling puzzler that surprises at almost every turn." PocketGamer
"The overall presentation in Stubies is nothing short of impressive." Arcade Sushi

Here comes the chaos! Are you ready? Welcome to the world of Stubies! Now the lives of these adorable characters are in your hands! Try to keep your screen clear before they turn your device into a complete chaos. Push them around and join them by color. But beware! Don’t let them fall off the platforms, letting them die is not an option!
Unleash the Special Stubies, activate gift boxes, and boost power-ups to master every level through the 5 amazing Worlds of Stubies.

Don't let their innocent look fool you, it won’t be easy!
They are ready to play! Are you?

-FEATURES-

-ORIGINAL GAMEPLAY.
New original concept and unique gameplay designed from scratch by CreatiuLab.

-100% TOUCH.
Stubies has been exclusively designed for touch-screen devices.
Master the game effortlessly with its accurate touch controls.

-UNIVERSAL APP. ONLY ON iOS.
iPad, iPod, or iPhone? Play Stubies everywhere and sync your progress with iCloud.

-POLISHED 3D GRAPHICS AND SMOOTH ANIMATIONS.

-75 LEVELS THROUGH 5 AMAZING WORLDS

-LANDSCAPE AND PORTRAIT MODE.
Stubies is a responsive mobile game where every level has been carefully designed for both landscape and portrait screen orientations. Choose whatever suits you best!

-100% INDIE GAME.
No Publisher, No investor. As always, Thank you for your support!

Having any problems? Any suggestions? We would love to hear from you! You can reach us at info@creatiulab.com

Follow Creatiulab on Facebook and Twitter:

https://www.facebook.com/creatiulab
https://twitter.com/creatiulab

More info:
http://www.creatiulab.com

NOTE: Some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you don’t want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your device's settings.
